title: E-commerce Platform Testing
description: Comprehensive testing of a full-scale e-commerce platform including user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, payment processing, and order management. Implemented automated test suites for critical user journeys and API endpoints.

title: Mobile Banking App QA
description: End-to-end testing of a mobile banking application focusing on security, usability, and performance. Conducted thorough testing of financial transactions, biometric authentication, and cross-platform compatibility.

title: Healthcare API Testing Suite
description: Developed comprehensive API testing framework for healthcare management system. Focused on HIPAA compliance, data integrity, and performance under high load conditions. Automated regression testing for multiple API versions.

title: SaaS Platform Performance Testing
description: Performance testing and optimization of a multi-tenant SaaS platform. Identified bottlenecks, conducted load testing, and provided recommendations for scaling. Achieved 40% improvement in response times.

title: Educational Platform Automation
description: Built complete test automation framework for online learning platform. Covered user registration, course enrollment, video streaming, assignments, and grading system. Integrated with CI/CD pipeline for continuous testing.

title: IoT Device Testing Framework
description: Designed and implemented testing strategy for IoT devices in smart home ecosystem. Tested device connectivity, data transmission, mobile app integration, and cloud synchronization across multiple device types.
